content: Create new /api/chat endpoint for natural Master Agent conversation
Update Demo.jsx to use /api/chat instead of /api/chat (natural conversation)
Add gating logic to Demo.jsx (unauthenticated, demo expiry, phone verification)
Integrate GoogleUpgradeDialog after feedback submission for demo users
Handle 401 demo_expired and 403 phone_verification_required errors in axios interceptor
Test complete demo flow end-to-end with screenshot verification
